42.eng-name: The Book of Hunting and Slaughtering

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Zahadam Al-Jarmi said:"We were with Abu Musa and His food was brought, including chicken. Among the people there was a man from banu Taimullah who had reddish complexion, as if he were a freed slave. He did not come close and Abu Musa said: "Come (and eat) for I saw the Messenger of All eating it

chapter.eng-name: Permissibility Ofg Eating The Flesh Of Chickens
